title: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan With Shining Transparent Fan Rib for Wedding,Church,Festival,Dance,Party Prom,Club,EDM Accessory Black
descriptions:
Turn every moment into a spectacle with the HeyToo 9-inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan—your must-have accessory for weddings, church events, festivals, parties, prom nights, clubs, and every EDM-fueled dance floor. Dressed in sleek black with colorful shining glitter, this fan delivers instant flair with a brilliant sparkle that catches the light from every angle. The shining transparent ribs add a modern, luxe touch that looks stunning in photos and unforgettable in person.

- Compact yet impactful: 23 cm (9.05 in) long, expanding to a dramatic 42 cm (16.5 in) when opened.
- Effortless elegance: Lightweight, sturdy, low-noise, and easy to snap open for that satisfying flourish.
- Designed to dazzle: Glitter fabric + transparent fan ribs for a unique, elegant finish.
- Made for every vibe: Perfect for raves, festivals, EDM, Pride, techno nights, cosplay, discos, concerts, weddings, church events, and parties.
- Beyond the dance floor: Keep cool at the beach or seaside, elevate nights out, or use as chic wall decor.
- A gorgeous gift: A stylish, practical present for the trendsetter in your life.

Cool down, glow up, and own the moment—add the HeyToo Glitter Handheld Fan to your look and let your sparkle lead the way.
